message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a product that I believe would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its unique features and potential, I'm initially offering it at $1,150,000. I'm open to discussing this further, of course, but I believe this is a fair starting point reflecting its worth.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $1,050,000 for it.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I'm confident this product will bring you even more value than that, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000. I believe this is a very competitive offer, considering its potential benefits.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After considering the product's potential value to me, I am willing to pay $1,075,000 for it.
Bob, I appreciate your continued interest.  To find a middle ground, I'm willing to accept $1,090,000 for the product.  This feels like a fair offer considering its potential and our discussions.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. Based on my assessment of the product's value, I am willing to pay $1,080,000 for it.
